title: Pottadhu Paththala Lyrics Saguni
stanzas:
Pottadhu paththala mappula
innoru quateru sollundi
appadiye matter keludaa

kannula rummu jinnu
ooththina aththa ponnu
bodhaiya yethikinnu 
aada porenda..

venaandaa vettu kuthu
podudaa dappaankuthu
yenakku ellaarume
sondhakaarandaa

Pottadhu paththala mappula
innoru quateru sollundi
appadiye matter keludaa

venaam macha soru
nee sollu rendu beeru
ada kuppathotti kooda
namakku panju methadaa

ye kudikaaran pechu
adhu vidunjiputta pochu
ada senja thappa
marandhu pogum
dheivam naangadaa

kavalai ellaam veratta
nee manasu vittu pesu
ne pesalana pottathellaam
lossu thaanadaa.

ada vaanam boomi sirusu
indha baru thaanda perusu
idhu kudika porandha
manushanukku sorgam thaanada

oru pegu
adida rendu pegu
adichu yaethikittu
apathaa neeyum kinguda

Pottadhu paththala mappula
innoru quateru sollundi
appadiye matter kelud

enakkunuthaan porandhaa
ava yenda enna marandhaa
ye ninjil koodu kattiputtu
parandhuputta daa

thandhen indha madiya
ava vachcha adhil vediya
naan thoolu thoolaa
sukkunooraa sedhariputtenda

ada thallaaduthu kaalu
enna thaangikolla yaaru
naan polamburatha ketka
oru koottam venumdaa

ye eththanayo sogam
adha enna kooru podum
ada ennennamo nenaikuren
vaartha valladaa

Pottadhu paththala mappula
innoru quateru sollundi
appadiye matter keludaa

kannula rummu jinnu
ooththina aththa ponnu
bodhaiya yethikinnu 
aada porenda..

venaandaa vettu kuthu
podudaa dappaankuthu
yenakku ellaarume
sondhakaarandaa
